abstract: White House names former executive Herbert M Allison Jr to independently review federal loans to energy companies, as House Republicans announced they would consider subpoenaing records related to a 2009 loan to Solyndra, California manufacturer of solar-energy equipment that is now bankrupt.
snippet: The White House named Herbert M. Allison Jr. to independently review federal energy loans, as House Republicans announced they would consider subpoenaing records into a loan to Solyndra.
lead_paragraph: The White House named Herbert M. Allison Jr. to independently review federal energy loans, as House Republicans announced they would consider subpoenaing records into a loan to Solyndra.

headline.main: Leader Picked for Review of U.S. Loans on Energy
headline.print_headline: Leader Picked for Review Of U.S. Loans on Energy
headline.seo: After Solyndra Case, Ex-Businessman to Review Energy Loans
